channel.title: How do i get friends to join?
channel.description: well i downloaded a source and a client, and i wanna just mess around with my friends, i don't plan on making anything online just simpling playing with a few.. So how do i get them online? what do they need to download and what do i need to do?

item.title: How do i get friends to join?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“weezy baby, post:6, topic:394103”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=491288.msg3592681#msg3592681 date=1304781747]
Download hamachi. Set it up. Make a hamachi group thing and get the IP and then put it in the client IP spaces. With hamachi people, people will have to download and install but they also have to have the password. So its good for servers for your friends only.
[/quote] what do they need to download and install? Hamachi and can you give me a link?[/quote]Just do what I posted, because hamachi tends to have viruses, lol.

If you really want to use it, you can find it here: https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi2/

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get friends to join?

With hamachi people, people will have to download and install but they also have to have the password. So its good for servers for your friends only.[/quote] what do they need to download and install? Hamachi and can you give me a link?

item.source: How do i get friends to join?

item.title: How do i get friends to join?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

First of all, you’ll need to portforward port 43594 if you haven’t already.

You can find a guide in the Tutorial section of MoparScape or on www.portforward.com

Then you will need to get a no-ip address here: www.no-ip.org

And after you make one, put the address you made in place of 127.0.0.1 in both your Gui.java and Client.java client sided.

I reccomend you go to the tutorial section for this. It’s not as hard as you’d think. : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,193370.0.html

There’s a good one, just follow the guide and your friends should be able to connect in no time. Goodluck.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get friends to join?

@runewings317 wrote:

Download hamachi. Set it up. Make a hamachi group thing and get the IP and then put it in the client IP spaces. With hamachi people, people will have to download and install but they also have to have the password. So its good for servers for your friends only.
